text: Fraidy cat (also known as scaredy cat) is a slang term for a person who is very skittish or fearful. Fraidy Cat may mean: *Fraidy Cat (movie), a 1942 Tom and Jerry cartoon short *"Fraidy Cat" (Garfield and Friends), a 1988 episode of Garfield and Friends *Fraidy Cat (TV series), a cartoon series *Fraidy Katt (band), a Canadian band *Fraidy Cat, a 2008 animated horror short movie from S4 Studios
title: Fraidy Cat
